lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did Jenny want to leave the wedding reception?
Jeremy Hampton has a large circle of friends and is very popular at parties.
lyrics.translation: 杰里米·汉普顿有很多朋友，并且在聚会上非常受欢迎。

lyrics.text: Everybody admires him for his great sense of humour.
lyrics.translation: 每个人都因为他的幽默感而钦佩他。

lyrics.text: Everybody that is, except his six-year-old daughter, Jenny.
lyrics.translation: 每个人都这样，除了他六岁的女儿，珍妮。

lyrics.text: Recently, one of Jeremy's closest friends asked him to make a speech at a wedding reception.
lyrics.translation: 最近，杰里米的一个最亲密的朋友请他在一个婚宴上发表演讲。

lyrics.text: This is the sort of thing that Jeremy loves.
lyrics.translation: 这是杰里米喜欢的那种事情。

lyrics.text: He prepared the speech carefully and went to the wedding with Jenny.
lyrics.translation: 他仔细准备了演讲，然后和詹妮一起去了婚礼。

lyrics.text: He had included a large number of funny stories in the speech, and of course it was a great success.
lyrics.translation: 他在演讲中加入了许多有趣的故事，当然，这是一个巨大的成功。

lyrics.text: As soon as he had finished, Jenny told him she wanted to go home.
lyrics.translation: 他一说完，珍妮就告诉他她想回家。

lyrics.text: Jeremy was a little disappointed by this, but he did as his daughter asked.
lyrics.translation: 杰里米对此有点失望，但他还是按照女儿的要求做了。

lyrics.text: On the way home, he asked Jenny if she had enjoyed the speech.
lyrics.translation: 在回家的路上，他问珍妮是否喜欢那场演讲。

lyrics.text: To his surprise, she said she hadn't.
lyrics.translation: 令他惊讶的是，她说她没有。

lyrics.text: Jeremy asked her why this was so, and she told him that she did not like to see so many people laughing at him.
lyrics.translation: 杰里米问她为什么会这样，她告诉他她不喜欢看到这么多人嘲笑他。
